description: JP Enhancing coordination for disaster response in the Kyrgyz Republic

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: Poor and vulnerable groups have increased and more equatable access to quality basic social services and benefits, in a strengthened pro-poor environment. Enhanced response to, and mitigation of, natural disasters improve living conditions for the poor. Improve inter-agency cooperation and coordination, strengthen  regional early-warning and disaster preparedness and response capacities, harmonization of disaster management, etc.
donor_long: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HR
